{"step_by_step_thinking": "Dengue is a viral infection and the diagnosis can be made by several methods. Viral culture and isolation in C6/36 cell line (option A) is a method to grow the virus and confirm its presence. NS1 antigen detection (option C) is a test that detects the presence of the dengue virus in the blood. The ELISA for antibody against dengue virus (option B) is a test that detects the body's immune response to the virus.
